# `DeanonymizeParams`

```ts
type DeanonymizeParams =
  | ({ signInMethod: 'email-password' } & SignUpParams)
  | ({
      signInMethod: 'passwordless'
      connection: 'email'
    } & SignInPasswordlessEmailParams)
  | ({
      signInMethod: 'passwordless'
      connection: 'sms'
    } & SignInPasswordlessSmsParams)
```
